name: Kingdom Force - Web Edition
description:
http://www.thankgames.com

Kingdom Force is a free online strategy game of Middle Ages. Construct strongholds to protect your kingdom, build a tremendous army of archers, knights, swordsmen and other fearless units, join alliances with friends to conquer the world together, it's time for you to lead your people to glory!

Android App

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=general.thankgames.com
